mapper.select: SELECT todo_id, todo_title, todo_category, todo_detail, finished, updated_at, created_at FROM todo WHERE todo_id = #{todoId}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO todo ( todo_id, todo_title, todo_category, todo_detail, finished, updated_at, created_at ) VALUES ( #{todoId}, #{todoTitle}, #{todoCategory} #{todoDetail}, #{finished}, #{updatedAt}, #{createdAt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE todo SET todo_title = #{todoTitle}, todo_category = #{todoCategory}, todo_detail = #{todoDetail}, finished = #{finished}, updated_at = current_timestamp WHERE todo_id = #{todoId} AND updated_at = #{updatedAt}
